import React ,{useState}from 'react' const Register = () => { const [name , setName]=useState(""); const [email , setEmail]=useState(""); const [password , setPassword]=useState(""); const [confPassword , setConfPassword]=useState(""); return (
Name
setName(ev.target.value)} />
Email
setEmail(ev.target.value)} />
Password
setPassword(ev.target.value)} />
Confirm Password
setConfPassword(ev.target.value)}/>
) } export default Register
